1.0.name: wordpress/snippet-vault
1.0.description:
Snippet Vault allows a WordPress user to easily add stored snippets of html, iframes, short codes, and other random text to a post, page, or custom post type.

Snippet Vault Supports:

  • Posts, Pages, and Custom Post Types
  • Visual and HTML Editors
  • HTML, iFrame, short code, plain text, and other code snippets
